description: This file provides API functions for managing teams, including listing, creating, retrieving details, and adding members, by making HTTP requests via a shared 'apiRequest' helper.

methods.name: listTeams({ token, limit, offset })
methods.description: Lists teams with optional pagination using GET /teams.

methods.name: createTeam({ token, name })
methods.description: Creates a new team via POST /teams.

methods.name: getTeam({ token, teamId })
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific team via GET /teams/{team_id}.

methods.name: addTeamMember({ token, teamId, userId, roleInTeam })
methods.description: Adds a member to a team via POST /teams/{team_id}/members.

ctags.name: addTeamMember
ctags.pattern: /^export async function addTeamMember({ token, teamId, userId, roleInTeam }) {$/

ctags.name: listTeams
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listTeams({ token, limit, offset }) {$/
